alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 12 at 7:30PM EST until January 12 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 22 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA JACKSON WASHINGTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 17 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BROOKS COLQUITT THOMAS TIFT TURNER WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER CALHOUN DECATUR DOUGHERTY EARLY GRADY LEE MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE TERRELL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBANY, ALFORDS, ARLINGTON, ASHBURN, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BLAKELY, BLUE SPRINGS, BOYKIN, BRANCHVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BROWNTOWN, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CENTERVILLE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL AIRPORT, CHULA, CLARKS MILL, COLQUITT, COMMISSARY HILL, COOKTOWN, CORDRAYS MILL, COTTON, COTTONWOOD, CRYSTAL LAKE, CUBA, DAVIS PARK, DAWSON, DAWSON MUNICIPAL A/P, DECATUR CO A/P, DICKEY, DILLON, DIXIE, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOTHAN, DOUGLASVILLE, DOVEREL, EARLY CO A/P, EAST ALBANY, EDISON, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, EMPRESS, ENTERPRISE, FAIRCHILD, FIVE POINTS, FORRESTER, GAMMAGE, GORDY, GRACEVILLE, GRADY CO A/P, GRAVES, GROOVERVILLE, HANOVER, HARDING, HAWKINSTOWN, HEROD, HOBBY, HOGGARD MILL, ISABELLA, IVEYS MILL, LEESBURG, LITTLE HOPE, LOCKETT CROSSING, LYNN, MALONE, MARIANNA, MAYHAW, METCALF, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MORGAN, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NEWTON, ORANGE HILL, PALMYRA, PASCO, PELHAM, PINE PARK, POPLAR HEAD, PRETORIA, QUITMAN, RED ROCK, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RICHTER CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SIMSVILLE, SMITHVILLE, SNEADS, SOUTHWEST GA REGIONAL A/P, SPENCE AIRPORT, STEINHAM STORE, SUNSWEET, SYLVESTER, SYLVESTER AIRPORT, THOMASVILLE, TIFTON, TURNER CITY, WALKER, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WILLIAMSBURG, WORTH, AND YEOMANS.
